articles.author: Paula  Cohen, Emily Mae  Czachor, Lucia I Suarez Sang
articles.title: Winter storm snarls thousands of flights during busy holiday weekend. Maps show the latest forecast. - CBS News
articles.description: More than 51 million Americans live in areas under winter storm alerts stretching from northern Minnesota to the Eastern Seaboard.
articles.content: More than 3,000 flights were canceled or delayed across the United States on Sunday after a winter storm packing ice and snow slammed the Midwest and Great Lakes regions during the busy travel period… [+4646 chars]

articles.author: Cheyanne M. Daniels
articles.title: Rep. Mike Turner defends US strikes against ISIS targets in Nigeria - Politico
articles.description: Turner called the strikes a “continuation” of America's conflict with ISIS.
articles.content:
Turner added that the strikes were undertaken with the cooperation of the Nigerian government, which the Pentagon previously confirmed to POLITICO.
